name: Keyword search (over extracted artifacts)
description: Keyword searching only applied over extracted artifacts
details: This limited scope search may be performed within tools themselves e.g. McQuaid (2017), or within an exported packaged report.
references: McQuaid, J. (2017) ‘Using Keywords with Magnet AXIOM’, Magnet Forensics [Blog], https://www.magnetforensics.com/blog/using-keywords-with-magnet-axiom/
